content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to view the apartment. What is your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Juan Mamani

content: My budget is 800 Euros per month. How about you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My landlord is looking for a monthly rental of 950 Euros. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually acceptable price. Would you consider a rental price of 900 Euros per month?
name: Juan Mamani

content: I can go up to 950 Euros per month. But I need to see the apartment first to decide. Can I come back tomorrow?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, of course. You can come back tomorrow to see the apartment more thoroughly and make a final decision on the rental price. In the meantime, I will be available to answer any questions you may have.
name: Juan Mamani
